scripts.start: nodemon --exec 'npm run build && open yocto-cfa.pdf' --watch src --ext js,mdx,css,svg
scripts.build: gatsby build && node_modules/prince/prince/lib/prince/bin/prince --pdf-profile PDF/A-1b --fileroot public --no-artificial-fonts --fail-dropped-content --fail-missing-resources --fail-missing-glyphs public/index.html --output yocto-cfa.pdf
